text: @NYGovCuomo Thank you. Wearing a mask is not political. It’s about caring for your fellow citizens. A simple necessity to beat #COVID19 and stop needless deaths. Plus, studies show that wearing a mask does reduce transmission. https://t.co/Qz5uOLX8nb
